languages.text: "Вернись к своим людям, Домин'{name}, ибо горько им умирать без гласа твоего. Речи Мастера вокса звучат еще в отсеках, гремят там звуки стрельбы, и шепчут ткачи, что не пала покуда застава блюстителей. Значит, еще не настал конец. Пусть Завет Паутины ведет твой клинок, Домин'{name}. Поспеши".

"Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."
languages.original_text: "Вернись к своим людям, Домин'{name}, ибо горько им умирать без гласа твоего. Речи Мастера вокса звучат еще в отсеках, гремят там звуки стрельбы, и шепчут ткачи, что не пала покуда застава блюстителей. Значит, еще не настал конец. Пусть Завет Паутины ведет твой клинок, Домин'{name}. Поспеши".

traits.locale_text: "Go back to your people, Enim'{name}, for it is hard for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still ring out in the compartments, the guns still bark, the weavers say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The battle rages on. May Ahn'shini guide your blade, Enim'{name}. Be swift."

"Go back to your people, Enim'{name}, for it is hard for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still ring out in the compartments, the guns still bark, the weavers say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The battle rages on. May Ahn'shini guide your blade, Enim'{name}. Be swift."

The weavers say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The battle rages on. May Ahn'shini guide your blade, Enim'{name}. Be swift."

"Go back to your people, Enim'{name}, for it is hard for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the compartments, and the guns still bark. The weavers say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The battle rages on. May Ahn'shini guide your blade, Enim'{name}. Be swift."

"Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

"Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

languages.text: «Vuelva con su gente, Domin'{name}, pues es difícil que mueran sin su voz. Las súplicas de la maestra de vocos aún resuenan por las bahías, y los cañones aún rugen. Los tejedores afirmamos que el puesto de seguridad aún no ha caído. No es el fin. Que la Doctrina de la Red guíe su arma, Domin'{name}. Actúe con rapidez».
languages.original_text: "Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

traits.locale_text: «Vuelva con su gente, Domin'{name}, pues es difícil que mueran sin su voz. Las súplicas de la maestra de vocos aún resuenan por las bahías, y los cañones aún rugen. Los tejedores afirmamos que el puesto de seguridad aún no ha caído. No es el fin. Que la Doctrina de la Red guíe su arma, Domin'{name}. Actúe con rapidez».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}よ、仲間のもとへ戻るのだ。あなたの声がなければ彼らも死にきれまい。ヴォクス・マスターの悲痛な声が今もベイにこだまして、銃声が鳴り響いている。ウィーヴァーたちの話では、エンフォーサーの駐屯所はまだ落ちていない。今はまだ終わりのときではない。ドミン・…ウェブの教義、{mf|彼|彼女}の刃を導きたまえ。{name}急ぐんだ」
languages.original_text: "Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}よ、仲間のもとへ戻るのだ。あなたの声がなければ彼らも死にきれまい。ヴォクス・マスターの悲痛な声が今もベイにこだまして、銃声が鳴り響いている。ウィーヴァーたちの話では、エンフォーサーの駐屯所はまだ落ちていない。今はまだ終わりのときではない。ドミン・…ウェブの教義、{mf|彼|彼女}の刃を導きたまえ。{name}急ぐんだ」

languages.text: “快回到你的同伴身边吧，秘者{name}。若是失去了你的声音，他们将无法得到安宁的死亡。音阵大师的呼唤依然在甲板上回响，无数枪口依然在轰鸣。织网者说，执法者的哨站依然没有沦陷。现在还不是结束的时候，愿织血罗网的教义指引你的利刃，秘者{name}。快点行动吧。”
languages.original_text: "Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

traits.locale_text: “快回到你的同伴身边吧，秘者{name}。若是失去了你的声音，他们将无法得到安宁的死亡。音阵大师的呼唤依然在甲板上回响，无数枪口依然在轰鸣。织网者说，执法者的哨站依然没有沦陷。现在还不是结束的时候，愿织血罗网的教义指引你的利刃，秘者{name}。快点行动吧。”

languages.text: "Geht zurück zu Euren Leuten, Domin'{name}, denn ohne Eure Stimme sterben sie nur schwer. Das Flehen der Voxmeisterin hallt noch immer durch die Module, und die Läufe der Waffen bellen noch immer. Die Spinner sagen, der Posten der Enforcer sei noch nicht gefallen. Das Ende ist noch nicht gekommen. Mögen die Grundsätze des Netzes ihre Klinge lenken, Domin'{name}. Seid schnell."
languages.original_text: "Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

traits.locale_text: "Geht zurück zu Euren Leuten, Domin'{name}, denn ohne Eure Stimme sterben sie nur schwer. Das Flehen der Voxmeisterin hallt noch immer durch die Module, und die Läufe der Waffen bellen noch immer. Die Spinner sagen, der Posten der Enforcer sei noch nicht gefallen. Das Ende ist noch nicht gekommen. Mögen die Grundsätze des Netzes ihre Klinge lenken, Domin'{name}. Seid schnell."

languages.text: « Retournez auprès de votre peuple, Domin'{name}, car il leur est difficile de mourir sans votre voix. Les appels de la maîtresse-vox résonnent encore dans les baies, et les canons continuent de rugir. Les tisseurs affirment que le poste des prévôts n'est pas encore tombé. La fin n'est pas encore venue. Que les Préceptes de la Toile guident votre lame, Domin'{name}. Hâtez-vous. »
languages.original_text: "Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."

traits.locale_text: « Retournez auprès de votre peuple, Domin'{name}, car il leur est difficile de mourir sans votre voix. Les appels de la maîtresse-vox résonnent encore dans les baies, et les canons continuent de rugir. Les tisseurs affirment que le poste des prévôts n'est pas encore tombé. La fin n'est pas encore venue. Que les Préceptes de la Toile guident votre lame, Domin'{name}. Hâtez-vous. »

languages.text: "Halkınıza geri dönün Domin'{name}. Çünkü sizin sesinizi duymadan ölmek, onlar için zor olacak. Voks Üstadı'nın yalvarışları, bölmelerde hâlâ yankılanıyor. Namluların ağızları ise hâlâ haykırıyor. Dokurlar, infazcı mevkisinin henüz düşmediğini söylüyor. Son henüz gelmedi. Ağ'ın İlkeleri, kılıcınıza kılavuz olsun Domin'{name}. Acele edin."
languages.original_text: "Go back to your people, Domin'{name}, for it is difficult for them to die without your voice. The Vox Master's pleas still echo through the bays, and the muzzles still bark. The spinners say that the enforcers' post has not yet fallen. The end is not now. May the Tenets of the Web guide your blade, Domin'{name}. Be swift."
